pullRequest.title: SAK-44597 Rubrics: Error in console sorting rubrics
pullRequest.bodyText: SAK-44597 Rubrics: Error in console sorting rubrics

nodes.bodyText:
Why not get rid of that toString on sortInput. className is always a string. Also, you can just go if (!sortInput). Empty strings are falsy in JS.
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/className
